Title: Missing in Action
Writer: Arthur Silver (characters), Larry Levinson (characters), Steve Bing (characters), James Bruner (screenplay), John Crowther (story), Lance Hool (story)
Actors: Chuck Norris, M. Emmet Walsh, David Tress, Lenore Kasdorf
Plot: Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.
